data.text: @sulleynz1989 @nzherald Yeah…I’m not convinced they care about the elderly

@nzherald Shhh,  you'll have idiots picketing there next. 

#endtheprotest

@nzherald “The healthcare group had learnt a lot from its villages in Australia so was being cautious and putting its residents first”

Putting the residents first? Residents need social interaction to survive. This is bordering on the criminally negligent.
@nzherald No one going into care. No carers
